data.label:
Patricio Alvarez (R)

"So... Your Majesty. You are aware that nobody in Lespia nor our alliance supports of this visit."

Narrator

As our convoy eased to a stop at the entrance of the Yellow House, I stepped out onto the cobblestone driveway. The building itself was a small but imposing structure of classical design, its yellow-painted walls standing out boldly against the greenery of the park.

Player_Romus

"We don't need to let our agreement with Prime Minister Saltana sour our relations with Lespia."

Player_Romus

"Well, I'm here to discuss all of that today."

Player_Romus

"It's good to see you too, Prime Minister Alvarez."

Player_Romus

"I hope we can set a few things straight today."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"So... Your Majesty. I must say nobody in my government supports this visit."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"Then let's take a step back and start our discussion in a calm manner."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"Why did Rizia publish this so-called evidence? You did not even have a dialogue with me about it until now."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"Does Rizia really want to make an enemy of Lespia, Your Majesty?"

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"So, I would firstly extend my thanks for signing the gas deal with us."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"I've heard from Mr. Reinhart that you did not agree to the prices in our gas offer."

Player_Romus

"Of course we want to have access to the energy but if you thought you can threaten me with it, you're wrong."

Player_Romus

"I'm sorry, Mr. Alvarez but I simply cannot accept those prices. After all the compromise we've given, I believe we deserve better prices than this."

Player_Romus

"We don't want anything to do with it anymore, now that Lespia controls it."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"But I would have preferred to have reached an agreement on the ITZ as well."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"I will take the liberty to say that you've started quite a mess by casting your vote the way you did."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"I know about the deal you made with Prime Minister Saltana."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"You are allowing their government to take control of our shares in the operations... Just like that..."

Player_Romus

"There could have been past mistakes, Mr. Alvarez. That doesn't mean we cannot work together."

Player_Romus

"Nobody's trying to screw over anyone. I'm just taking the options that are in the best interests of Rizia."

Player_Romus

"Look, Mr. Alvarez. There is no hostility from Rizia towards Lespia. However, you must finally learn that Rizia is not going to be bullied."

Player_Romus

"I suppose not."

Player_Romus

"You should be happy that I didn't vote for nationalization."

Player_Romus

"It's part of the plan, Mr. Alvarez. Having long negotiations doesn't mean we'll reach a conclusion after all."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"Well, at least, we can agree on the situation with the ITZ."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"We cannot simply manipulate the market and give Rizia an edge over everyone else now, can we?"

Player_Romus

"Well, I'm here to discuss precisely that."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"Lespia is a democracy, Your Majesty. Unfortunately, I don't have the authority to manipulate that."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"You might be enjoying the occasional visit to Morella, Your Majesty, but I certainly do not."

Player_Romus

"I thought Lespia knew how to make business. With this attitude, you'll lose all of your partners in no time."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"Did Mr. Smolak tell you this? Sounds like his brand."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"An interesting conspiracy theory."

Player_Romus

"You cannot threaten me, Mr. Alvarez."

Player_Romus

"No. Despite everything, we still believe in cooperation."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"Only according to your reports... The truth is a slippery concept, Your Majesty."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"You've clearly answered your own question there."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"Well, my government thinks you're here to threaten Lespia."

Player_Romus

"You'd better cooperate, Mr. Alvarez. Because I know about Lespia's involvement in the Zille bombing, you see..."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"Okay. We'll supply Rizia with the energy it needs. From 7 Arcasian Liras per thousand cubic meters."

Player_Romus

"And that's a deal, Mr. Alvarez. Thank you."

Player_Romus

"Lespia is the side that's being greedy here."

Player_Romus

"I am, Mr. Alvarez. As a matter of fact, my intention has never been to give what Morella and Valgsland wants. The voting was just a play."

Player_Romus

"I am also free to tell the world about Lespia's involvement in the Zille bombing, Mr. Alvarez..."

Player_Romus

"If you're going to give me a good price, I'm willing to do that."

Narrator

We shook hands.

Narrator

He walked to a wooden cabinet full of alcohol bottles.

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"If we veto the proposed renegotiation plan, it cannot be implemented."

Player_Romus

"I'm afraid I cannot do that."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"Great to hear that."

Narrator

He smiled.

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"Just think about it."

Narrator

He frowned.

Player_Romus

"That was just part of the plan, Mr. Alvarez. Don't worry. We won't give them an inch from the ITZ."

Player_Romus

"That's up to you, isn't it?"

Player_Romus

"Look, Mr. Alvarez. I have evidence of your involvement in Zille bombing. You will vote for the proposed resolution, and I will not release the evidence. How about that?"

Player_Romus

"I'm good. Thank you."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"Your people have contacted us about the MITZ earlier. I believe Rizia wants to cooperate against Morella."

Player_Romus

"What's your plan?"

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"Just to be clear. There cannot be any cooperation with Rizia after this."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"Lespia is a democracy, Your Majesty. That might be hard for you to comprehend but I'm not behind every decision here."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"Okay, so you claim you already know. What is it do you still want to hear from me?"

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"If you want any cooperation from Lespia, you *must* sabotage the deal you made with Morella and make sure the arrangement never comes to pass."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"Otherwise, I'm afraid we won't be able to maintain our partnership or pursue further agreements with Rizia."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"I'll be blunt. We are in a breaking point of Lespian-Rizian relations."

Player_Romus

"What are you talking about? We know that Lespia is responsible for this. You committed an act of terror."

Player_Romus

"You'd better cooperate with me, Mr. Alvarez. I've also heard the public opinion is now against you. You sure you can get elected again?"

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"Leave that up to me, Your Majesty."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"Give us access to this energy network project. We'll handle the costs and connect the pipeline to Lespia and be part of this network through Rizia."

Player_Romus

"I cannot give you access to this network without consulting with our partners. And I believe they will oppose the idea. I'm sorry."

Player_Romus

"You should be trying to make amends with us now, Mr. Alvarez. Don't forget about what we discussed regarding the evidence..."

Player_Romus

"Sounds good, Mr. Alvarez. I believe that's a deal."

Player_Romus

"You read my mind."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"That's great to hear!"

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"Alright. But you're making a mistake."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"That's great to hear!"

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"Fine. We will pay for the access. We'll support the construction expenses of all the partners."

Player_Romus

"I'm afraid I have to decline."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"That's great to hear!"

Player_Romus

"This is an extremely major incident, Mr. Alvarez. You cannot simply play ignorant. Rizia wants to see action from Lespia. Not the other way around."

Player_Romus

"Tell me. Why? What did Lespia hope to achieve with this?"

Player_Romus

"You have to pay for the incident. Not only it incited an international crisis, innocent people also lost their lives. You must claim responsibility."

Player_Romus

"Fine. I will sabotage the deal. I don't want our relations with Lespia to suffer."

Player_Romus

"You're going to *make sure*? We have proof that you've already actively worked against our interests."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"If I lose in the next elections, you'll be dealing with someone who clearly opposes your regime in its entirety. I wonder what you'll think of me then."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"Good. Certainly a step in the right direction."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"I refuse to accept any responsibility. You should have never published that investigation."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"You know... I have concerns about the stability of this region. And I know that you're funding the BFF with Rumburg."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"Your allies are complicit in this instability. As much as I support any actions against the Wehzek government, as well as any substantial support for movements as just as the Bludish rebels..."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"The Wehzeks seized the assets of our companies and sent a wave of refugees towards our borders. They're escalating the problem."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"And now Smolak seems to be getting closer to Sordland. This is a threat for us."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"And... Lespia also has a considerable number of Bludish people living inside our borders. We don't want the problems of Sordland and Wehlen to spread to our country."

Player_Romus

"I'll take that into consideration."

Player_Romus

"I completely agree."

Player_Romus

"Then I'd rather make friends with him."

Player_Romus

"With all due respect, how is this new information?"

Player_Romus

"You are already aware of our situation with him, Mr. Alvarez..."

Player_Romus

"I know. He really is an intriguing man."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"Better safe than sorry."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"I'm also worried about Valgsland's closer ties with our northern neighbors."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"Be careful who you're dealing with, Your Majesty. You may be playing into their hands."

Player_Romus

"Thank you for the advice, Mr. Alvarez."

Player_Romus

"That's exactly how the superpowers look at the world. I'm sorry but I don't intend to play the games of ATO or CSP."

Player_Romus

"Your comments are quite uncalled for. Why are you telling me this?"

Player_Romus

"Don't worry. I know exactly who I'm dealing with."

Player_Romus

"While I agree with the sentiment, I don't think Valgsland poses a direct threat to Rizia."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"It was just a simple advice. I apologize if I crossed a line."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"You might not see it yet, but I believe he intends to take Heljiland by force -- igniting a series of conflicts that we may find ourselves in the middle of."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"I know you have the ear of Queen Livingston."

Player_Romus

"Many would also argue that it is your alliance that stands in the way of peace and is escalating."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"Queen Beatrice certainly does hold the keys."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"That's a relief to hear."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"Thanks anyway."

Player_Romus

"Are you really going to keep denying this?"

Player_Romus

"Stop pretending, Mr. Alvarez. The secret is out."

Player_Romus

"Here is the evidence. See for yourself."

Player_Romus

"It's a deal, Mr. Alvarez."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"Good that we reached an understanding."

Narrator

He took another big gulp from his glass.

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"Was there anything else we could do for each other?"

Player_Romus

"I request financial assistance from Lespia. Maybe we can talk about a possible trade deal?"

Player_Romus

"Our energy demands are rising rapidly. I want to buy energy from Lespia."

Player_Romus

"No, Mr. Alvarez. Thank you for the meeting."

Player_Romus

"There is actually something I want to talk to you about, Mr. Alvarez. I have proof of Lespian involvement in the Zille bombing..."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"Thank you for coming, Your Majesty."

Player_Romus

"Thank you for the meeting."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"Look, Your Majesty. I am extremely sorry that such an incident occurred, but you have to trust me: I had no hand in this."

Player_Romus

"Are you really going to keep denying this?"

Player_Romus

"You made the whole Zille agreement collapse!"

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"Of course. Because I have nothing to do with it."

Player_Romus

"Does Alexei Radovic ring a bell?"

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"Did Mr. Smolak tell you this? Sounds like his brand."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"Quite the far-fetched theory."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"Rest assured, I will demand an explanation from our intelligence services."

Player_Romus

"Certain people in Rizia believe Lespia had a hand in the incident at the Palesian border. What do you have to say about that?"

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"That's funny."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"Was there anything else?"

Player_Romus

"We don't need to let our conflict with Pales sour our relations with Lespia."

Player_Romus

"Well, I'm here to discuss all of that today."

Player_Romus

"I'm concerned about the reaction of the ATO. Lespia has yet to announce any sanctions -- I hope you will not follow through."

Player_Romus

"I hope we can set a few things straight today."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"Do you think Rizia can get away with the invasion of Pales just like that?"

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"Are you serious, Your Majesty?"

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"Only if you're willing to stop the war and retreat."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"And why would I not follow through?"

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"I have to point out that there is not much I can offer in our discussion unless Rizia stops the war and retreats."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"The Grand Duchy of Pales is an important partner of Lespia. We not only have deep economic ties but recently have been establishing military ties as well."

Player_Romus

"I'm here for dialogue, Mr. Alvarez. You have to stop with the threats and look for a compromise."

Player_Romus

"I believe we can make a beneficial agreement for Lespia. Don't support Pales and we can share their resources or parts of Aureus with you."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"Don't be ridiculous."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"You seem overconfident. Considering that Rizia has yet to capture any of their war goals."

Player_Romus

"You're bluffing. Lespia would never enter a direct war with us."

Player_Romus

"You can't threaten me. Even if Lespia enters the war -- we will not stop fighting."

Player_Romus

"I'd prefer that support to be nonexistent, Mr. Alvarez."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"Especially since you've in some way declared us the enemy by publishing all the nonsensical *proof* without consulting with us."

Player_Romus

"I'd prefer that support to be nonexistent, Mr. Alvarez. We have proof of our involvement in the Zille bombing. You don't want that to be published, I'm sure."

Player_Romus

"Let's be reasonable. Nobody wants more conflict and violence."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"I thought you were a more careful man."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"Tomorrow, I will be signing off on military support worth of ten billion Arcasian Liras to Pales, as well as sanctions against Rizia."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"You can do whatever you want with it. We won't be blackmailed by that."

Player_Romus

"How about Lespia decides not to intervene and keep their support to Pales indirect and minimum -- and we will destroy the evidence."

Player_Romus

"Good. Then you won't mind if we publish it."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"And if more atrocities take place, we will think about intervening directly."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"Tomorrow, I have to sign off on military support worth of ten billion Arcasian Liras to Pales, as well as sanctions against Rizia."

Player_Romus

"I understand, Mr. Alvarez. You gotta to what you gotta do. But you have to promise me that no more support will be given after that."

Player_Romus

"We don't want to damage our trade. Can't we discuss any compromise on the sanctions?"

Player_Romus

"If you're not willing to help me out, I won't offer any easy solutions for your shipping lanes. In fact, I will make things very hard for you."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"Unbelievable..."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"You are free to do whatever you want, Your Majesty."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"With which navy? Your fleet cannot even match the power of Pales."

Narrator

He stared at me with furrowed brows.

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"Just be prepared to face the consequences."

Player_Romus

"There's nothing left to understand. I see your stance clearly. Our meeting is over."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"Look, Your Majesty. The western powers have mostly condemned the invasion and ATO is preparing to put sanctions on Rizia."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"I'm afraid there's nothing I can do for you anymore."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"You may have started a major conflict which can have chain reactions all around Merkopa..."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"Suit yourself."

Player_Romus

"Your position seems too rigid. I don't see any true willingness to support Rizia. So there seems to be no point in any discussion."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"As much as I want to help you, my hands are tied. You must understand my position for us to discuss anything."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"I understand."

Player_Romus

"I understand your predicament. But Lespians know how to make beneficial deals and I want to offer you one for both of our benefit."

Player_Romus

"I'm not taking this personally. I know we can work something out. You are clever man, Mr. Alvarez. You know that Pales has no chance of winning. Be on the winning side."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"I don't know, Your Majesty. You've lost a lot of men."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"Palesian Defence Forces are still in control of key locations like Arces and Ziqes. I'm not sure if things are really looking good for your side."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"Alright. Let's talk."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"Well... Your forces have already occupied both Arces and Ziqes. That is definitely one hell of an achievement, I must admit."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"But anyway... Let's talk about what you can offer us."

Narrator

He tapped his fingers on his knee, waiting for me to speak.

Player_Romus

"What will Lespia earn from this? You don't need to do this. Let me make an offer."

Player_Romus

"I understand your predicament. But Lespians know how to make beneficial deals and I want to offer you one for both of our benefit."

Player_Romus

"If you're going to continue with your threats, I will end the meeting here."

Player_Romus

"I will destroy the evidence of Lespian involvement in the Zille bombing if you stop sending military equipment to Pales."

Narrator

He looked at me with surprise in his eyes.

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"Alright. Deal."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"Alright. Deal."

Player_Romus

"I will pay you if you stop sending military equipment to Pales."

Player_Romus

"Just be direct with me. Is there anything I can offer you for Lespian support?"

Player_Romus

"Thank you, Mr. Alvarez. I'm glad we reached some understanding."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"I can't promise anything about Arcasia but I will do my best about Lespian sanctions."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"You know there is no way I can support this war, Your Majesty."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"The most I can offer is to veto the sanctions against Rizia when they reach me."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"Hmm... There is something that we may want."

Narrator

He looked thoughtful.

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"Or... You can give something the ATO wants."

Narrator

We shook hands.

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"Or... You can give something the ATO wants."

Player_Romus

"I will extend the pipeline and take care of the costs."

Player_Romus

"Deal. I'll lease Caleqabiz to Lespia."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"Great. And I'll stop the sanctions."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"Then I'm afraid I cannot help you."

Player_Romus

"How about the sanctions? Can we do something about that as well?"

Player_Romus

"Thank you, Mr. Alvarez. I'm glad we reached some understanding."

Player_Romus

"There is no way I can do that. You're being unreasonable."

Player_Romus

"Absolutely not."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"I'm being more than reasonable against your unjustifiable actions, Your Majesty. But suit yourself."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"Suit yourself, Your Majesty."

Narrator

We shook hands.

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"You've already lost a lot of men."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"I believe our support can easily allow Pales to stand their ground. You don't want to deplete your gold reserves in a war of attrition, Your Majesty."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"As much as I'm not opposed to helping you out, my hands are tied. You must understand my position."

Player_Romus

"What will Lespia earn from this? You don't need to do this. Let me make an offer."

Player_Romus

"I understand your predicament. But Lespians know how to make beneficial deals and I want to offer you one for both of our benefit."

Narrator

We both got up from our seats.

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"I'm sorry you came all the way for this."

Player_Romus

"I understand, Mr. Alvarez. You can officially take on a pro-Pales stance, but I believe we can still arrange something in the background."

Player_Romus

"I understand your predicament. But Lespians know how to make beneficial deals and I want to offer you one for both of our benefit."

Player_Romus

"Deal."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"I'm not sure if we can offer any extra money for the Rizian economy at the moment..."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"Alright. We can supply you our gas from 12.50 Arcasian Liras per thousand cubic meters."

Player_Romus

"That price is a little too steep for me."

Player_Romus

"Deal."

Player_Romus

"Deal. But I only need a short term deal to help us close the current demand."

Player_Romus

"After going through all that for the Aureus field, I'm not going to hand you the island right next to it."

Player_Romus

"What is your offering price?"

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"All ownership and extraction rights have already been resolved. The lease will not be disrupting that."

Player_Romus

"Still, that's out of the question."

Player_Romus

"I'm sorry, Mr. Alvarez. I was thinking more about a *conventional* trade deal."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"I understand."

Player_Romus

"Deal."

Player_Romus

"I'm afraid I can't agree to that price, Mr. Alvarez."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"I understand. Unfortunately I cannot offer anything else at the moment."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"Was there anything else?"

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"Today is turning out to be a great day."

Narrator

He laughed and drank his whiskey.

Player_Romus

"If you're not even going to acknowledge it, it will be published, Mr. Alvarez."

Player_Romus

"Nothing is for free, Mr. Alvarez. You know that better than me."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"I can provide the name and the documents if you, in exchange, destroy any and all evidence implicating Lespia in the Zille bombing. Agreed?"

Player_Romus

"Deal. I will destroy the evidence. I need to know this."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"I guarantee you this is something you will want to know. Something that could change your political landscape, even."

Player_Romus

"No. Mr. Alvarez. You cannot convince me like that. I cannot promise you anything."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"Just don't do anything reckless, Your Majesty. Let's not burn bridges."

Player_Romus

"Why not? We've both fallen off the wagon at this point."

Patricio Alvarez (R)

"Any other requests?"
